AD_MODULE.NAME: Etendo Print Provider
AD_MODULE.DESCRIPTION: Framework to register print providers, manage printers and templates, and route label jobs to provider-specific implementations for external middleware.
AD_MODULE.HELP: The Print Provider Framework lets administrators add any third-party printing middleware in the Print Providers window, storing URL endpoints and credentials per organisation. A second window, Provider Implementations (System Admin only), links each provider to the Java class that performs the integration—responsible for fetching printers, generating label files (PDF, ZPL) and sending them to the middleware’s print endpoint. The standard Printers window shows devices returned by the selected provider, updated via the Update Printers process. The generic process SendGeneratedLabelToPrinter can be attached to any window button (Product, Packing, Locator). It resolves provider, printer and template, generates the label and submits the job—returning success or error feedback to the user. By simply adding a connector module and registering its implementation class, new middleware can be adopted without touching functional modules.

AD_MODULE.AUTHOR: Futit Services S.L.
